description:
Исходный интерфейс для генерации JSON Schema файла конфигурации.

Здесь должен был быть описан весь интерфейс конфига, включая поле `projects,
но `typescript-json-schema` из интерфейсов вида `projects: { [key: string]: ApplicationConfigEntry | ModuleConfigEntry }`
генерирует compound ветку с ключевым словом `anyOf`.
Ajv не поддерживает применение default значений к compound веткам схемы https://github.com/ajv-validator/ajv#assigning-defaults,
поэтому генерируем параллельно конфиги для разных типов приложений,
которые можно использовать как угодно, в том числе внутри conditional веток с ключевыми словами `if`, `then`, `else`

root.title: path to the root directory relative to the tramvai.json

polyfill.title: Path to polyfill file. By default, looks for the `src/polyfill`

serverApiDir.title: Path to folder with papi handlers

server.title: Path to build assets for server

client.title: Path to build assets for client

routesDir.title: Folder with pages from which static routers are generated

pagesDir.title: Folder with components which can be manually added to static routers

componentsPattern.title: Test Regexp to add only files with specific name to list of FS Components

splitChunks.title: Configure the options on webpack splitChunks

granularChunksSplitNumber.title: Move module to shared chunk if used at least as many times in other chunks

granularChunksMinSize.title: Minimum shared chunk size in bytes

commonChunkSplitNumber.title: `@deprecated will be removed in next major release` Move module to common chunk if used at least as many times in other chunks

failOnBuild.description:
при включении этого флага в build-сборку добавляется проверка типов
при невалидных типах сборка падает

highlightCode.description: Syntax highlight the code as JavaScript for terminals. default: false

linesAbove.description: The number of lines to show above the error. default: 2

linesBelow.description: The number of lines to show below the error. default: 3

message.description:
Pass in a string to be displayed inline (if possible) next to the
highlighted location in the code. If it can't be positioned inline,
it will be placed above the code frame.
default: nothing

externals.title: Pass list to Webpack config externals field

src.title: Path to sw.ts file (relative to "root" directory)

dest.title: Name of generated SW file (will be placed in "output.client" directory)

exclude.title: Array of regexp specifiers used to exclude assets from the precache manifest

include.title: Array of regexp specifiers used to include assets in the precache manifest

chunks.title: Array of chunk names used to include in the precache manifest

excludeChunks.title: Array of chunk names used to exclude from the precache manifest

additionalManifestEntries.title: A list of entries to be included in the precache manifest, in addition to any entries that are generated as part of the build configuration

webmanifest.title: WebManifest content (manifest.json or webmanifest will be generated based on this options)

dest.title: Name of generated manifest file (will be placed in "output.client" directory). You can use `[hash]` placeholder for manifest cache busting in production mode

scope.title: prefer to use "pwa.sw.scope" instead, this field will be generated automatically

theme_color.title: prefer to use "pwa.meta.themeColor" instead, this field will be generated automatically

icons.title: prefer to use "pwa.icon" instead, this field will be generated automatically

src.title: Path to icon file (relative to "root" directory)

dest.title: Folder for generated icons (will be placed in "output.client" directory)

asyncWebAssembly.description: Support WebAssembly as asynchronous EcmaScript Module.

backCompat.description: Enable backward-compat layer with deprecation warnings for many webpack 4 APIs.
backCompat.title: Enable backward compatibility with webpack previous major versions

cacheUnaffected.description: Enable additional in memory caching of modules that are unchanged and reference only unchanged modules.
cacheUnaffected.title: Enable additional in-memory caching of modules which are unchanged and reference only unchanged modules.

futureDefaults.description: Apply defaults of next major version.

outputModule.description: Allow output javascript files as module source type.

syncWebAssembly.description: Support WebAssembly as synchronous EcmaScript Module (outdated).

topLevelAwait.description: Allow using top-level-await in EcmaScript Modules.

useImportModule.title: Use a new webpack API to execute modules instead of child compilers. This improves performance and memory usage a lot.

loader.title: specify loader to transpile js-ts code

excludesPresetEnv.title: List of modules to exclude from `@babel/preset-env`
excludesPresetEnv.description: Option doesn't affect build with swc loader

define.title: Define static variables that should be replaced by name with provided value

generateDataQaTag.title: `@deprecated` will be removed in next major release.

enableFillActionNamePlugin.title: `@deprecated` will be removed in next major release. Включает использование плагина fill-action-name

config.title: Path to postcss config file. By default, `postcss.config.js` file is used

assetsConfig.title: Path to postcss config file for assets

cssModulePattern.title: Enable CSS modules for all files matching /RegExp/i.test(filename) regexp.

alias.title:
`@deprecated` as cli now supports baseUrl and paths from the app's tsconfig.json file.
Just check or add configuration to your tsconfig file and remove alias from tramvai.json

provide.title: Browser packages to provide with ProvidePlugin. E.g. { "Buffer": ["buffer", "Buffer"] }

watchOptions.title: Configure https://webpack.js.org/configuration/watch/#watchoptions
watchOptions.description: For OSX users and big projects it's recommended to enable watch polling, e.g. `{ poll: 1000 }`, more info - https://github.com/webpack/watchpack/issues/222

aggregateTimeout.description: Delay the rebuilt after the first change. Value is a time in ms.

followSymlinks.description: Resolve symlinks and watch symlink and real file. This is usually not needed as webpack already resolves symlinks ('resolve.symlinks').

ignored.description: Ignore some files from watching (glob pattern or regexp).

stdin.description: Stop watching when stdin stream has ended.

enabledDev.title:
Does DedupePlugin should be enabled in development mode
Why it might be useful see [issue](https://github.com/Tinkoff/tramvai/issues/11)

parallel.title: Configuration for enabling parallel compression for terser plugin

notifications.title: Controls build notifications settings during development

suppressSuccess.title: Defines when success notifications are shown

suppressWarning.title: True to suppress the warning notifications, otherwise false

activateTerminalOnError.title: True to activate (focus) the terminal window when a compilation error occurs

suppressSuccess.title: Defines when success notifications are shown

suppressWarning.title: True to suppress the warning notifications, otherwise false

activateTerminalOnError.title: True to activate (focus) the terminal window when a compilation error occurs

suppressSuccess.title: Defines when success notifications are shown

suppressWarning.title: True to suppress the warning notifications, otherwise false

activateTerminalOnError.title: True to activate (focus) the terminal window when a compilation error occurs

shared.title: Specify dependencies that will be shared between application and child-apps
shared.description: Properly defining that dependencies may greatly reduce filesize of loaded js on the client

defaultTramvaiDependencies.title: Should default dependencies list be added to shared list
defaultTramvaiDependencies.description:
It includes the list of commonly used dependencies in the child-apps
By default, it is enabled in application in case of tramvai/module-child-app is specified in package.json
and for child-apps

flexibleTramvaiVersions.title: add caret range specifier for tramvai dependencies
flexibleTramvaiVersions.description: minimal versions are inferred from package.json

criticalChunks.title: add chunks to preload as critical in-parallel with "platform.js"
criticalChunks.description:
this option is useful when you need to create async boundary for app dependencies.
More info - https://webpack.js.org/concepts/module-federation/#uncaught-error-shared-module-is-not-available-for-eager-consumption

deps.title: list of the dependencies that will be shared

singleton.title: if dependency is marked as singleton the dependency will be initialized only once and will not be updated
singleton.description: Do not overuse that feature as it may lead to subtle bugs in case of different versions on different sides

assetsConfig.title: Path to postcss config file for assets

cssModulePattern.title: Enable CSS modules for all files matching /RegExp/i.test(filename) regexp.
